text: Tē'ōm̐ ka’lē, ‘hē mōra sampradāẏa! Kōraācōna tōmālōkē, ma'i yadi mōra pratipālakara paraā praēraita pramāṇata pratiṣṭhita thākō ārau tē'ōm̐ yadi mōka tē'ōm̐ra taraphara paraā anugraha dāna karaē, tathāpi'ō yadi ma'i āllāhara abādhya ha'ōm̐, tēntē āllāhara śāstira paraā mōka kōnē rakṣā karaiba? Gatikē tōmālōkē kērala mōra kṣatihē br̥d'dhi karai āchā’
